Metadata.title: Block Blast - Challenge Your Block-Clearing Skills | Free Online Puzzle Game
Metadata.description: Block Blast is an addictive online puzzle game that challenges players to place different shapes into a grid, clearing complete rows or columns for points. Easy to learn, yet hard to master!

play.title: Start Playing

introduction.title: Game Overview
introduction.content: Block Blast is an engaging online puzzle game that challenges players to strategically place various shapes into a grid. Clear complete rows or columns to score points. It's easy to pick up, but mastering it requires strategy and skill.

rules.title: Game Rules
items: Drag and drop blocks onto the grid
Blocks disappear when you complete a row or column
Game ends when no new blocks can be placed

howToPlay.title: How to Get Started
steps: Use your mouse or touchscreen to drag and drop blocks
Strategically place blocks to clear more rows and columns
Challenge yourself to achieve the highest score!

features.title: Game Features
items: Suitable for players of all ages
Compatible with both desktop and mobile devices
Easy to learn, challenging to master
Regular updates with new features and challenges
